recipe.title: Pimm's Cup
ingredients: 6 tablespoons (3 ounces) ginger beer or ginger ale
instructions: Fill highball glass with ice. Add Pimm's, then top with ginger beer, garnish with cucumber slice and mint sprig, and serve.
